___additionalSchemes.description: Additional uri schemes, default schemes including file & untitled.

___disableDiagnostics.description: Disable handle diagnostics for this languageserver.

___stdioEncoding.description: Encoding used for stdio of child process.

___revealOutputChannelOn.description: Configure message level to show the output channel buffer

___cwd.description: Working directory of languageserver, absolute path or relative to workspace folder, use workspace root by default

___disableWorkspaceFolders.description: Disable workspaceFolders feature for this languageserver.

___ignoredRootPaths.description: Absolute root paths that language server should not use as rootPath, higher priority than rootPatterns.

___trace.server.description: Trace level of communication between server and client

___rootPatterns.description: Root patterns used for reoslve rootPath from current file, default to workspace root

___disableCompletion.description: Disable completion feature for this languageserver.

___filetypes.description: Supported filetypes, use empty array for all filetypes.

___requireRootPattern.description: If true, doesn't start server when root pattern not found.

___execArgv.description: Argv passed to node when using module, normally used for debugging, ex: ["--nolazy", "--inspect-brk=6045"]

___transport.description: Transport kind used by server, could be 'ipc', 'stdio', 'socket' and 'pipe'

___transportPort.description: Port number used when transport is 'socket'

___module.description: Absolute path of javascript file, should works in IPC mode

___coc.source.file.trimSameExts.description: Trim same extension on file completion

___signature.preferShownAbove.description: Show signature help float window above cursor when possible, require restart service on change.

___diagnostic.checkCurrentLine.description: When enabled, show all diagnostics of current line instead of current position.

___suggest.triggerCompletionWait.description: Wait time between trigger character type and completion start, for wait server content synchronize.

___coc.preferences.snippetStatusText.description: Text shown in statusline to indicate snippet session is activated.

___suggest.labelMaxLength.description: Max length of abbr that shown as label of complete item.

___diagnostic.joinMessageLines.description: Join lines messages to reduce lines of floating window.

___list.nextKeymap.description: Key used for select next line on insert mode.

___codeLens.enable.description: Enable codeLens feature, require neovim with set virtual text feature.

___diagnostic.refreshAfterSave.description: Only refresh diagnostics after save, default false.

___list.previousKeymap.description: Key used for select previous line on insert mode.

___suggest.floatEnable.description: Enable floating window for documentation when possible.

___signature.target.description: Target of signature help, use float when possible by default.

___diagnostic.virtualText.description: Use NeoVim virtual text to display diagnostics

___coc.preferences.rootPatterns.description: Root patterns to resolve workspaceFolder from parent folders of opened files, resolved from up to down.

___coc.preferences.jumpCommand.description: Command used for location jump, like goto definition, goto references etc.

___suggest.triggerAfterInsertEnter.description: Trigger completion after InsertEnter, auto trigger should be 'always' to enable this option

___suggest.detailMaxLength.description: Max length of detail that should be shown in popup menu.

___suggest.preferCompleteThanJumpPlaceho.description: Confirm completion instead of jump to next placeholder when completion is activted.

___coc.preferences.previewAutoClose.description: Auto close preview window on cursor move.

___suggest.fixInsertedWord.description: Make inserted word replace word characters after cursor position.

___coc.preferences.watchmanPath.description: executable path for https://facebook.github.io/watchman/, detected from $PATH by default

___diagnostic.level.description: Used for filter diagnostics by diagnostic severity.

___coc.preferences.snippets.enable.description: Set to false to disable snippets support.

___diagnostic.highlightOffset.description: Offset number of buffer.addHighlight, neovim only.

___signature.hideOnTextChange.description: Hide signature float window when text changed, require restart service on change.

___diagnostic.enable.description: Set to false to disable diagnostic display

___diagnostic.virtualTextLines.description: The number of non empty lines from a diagnostic to display

___suggest.keepCompleteopt.description: When enabled, completeopt is not overriden, auto completion will be disabled if completeopt doesn't have noinsert and noselect.

___diagnostic.locationlist.description: Create location list for error & warning

___coc.preferences.formatOnSaveFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should run format on save.

___suggest.numberSelect.description: Input number to select complete item, it could wrong when using <up> and <down> to select complete item

___coc.preferences.messageLevel.description: Message level for filter echoed messages, could be 'more', 'warning' and 'error'

___coc.preferences.formatOnType.description: Set to true to enable format on type

___suggest.detailField.description: Where to add the detail in complete item when it's less than max length.

___suggest.acceptSuggestionOnCommitChara.description: Controls whether suggestions should be accepted on commit characters. For example, in JavaScript, the semi-colon (`;`) can be a commit character that accepts a suggestion and types that character. Requires CompleteChanged event to work.

___coc.source.around.firstMatch.description: Filter complete items by first letter strict match.

___suggest.noselect.description: Not make vim select first item on completion start

___suggest.disableKind.description: Remove kind field from vim complete item.

___signature.triggerSignatureWait.description: Timeout for trigger signature help, in miliseconds.

___suggest.lowPrioritySourceLimit.description: Max items count for source priority lower than 90.

___suggest.maxCompleteItemCount.description: Maximum number of complete items shown in vim

___coc.preferences.colorSupport.description: Enable color highlight if language server support it.

___diagnostic.enableMessage.description: When to enable echo messages of diagnostics.

___suggest.completionItemKindLabels.description: Set custom labels to completion items' kinds.

___coc.preferences.useQuickfixForLocatio.description:
Use vim's quickfix list for jump locations,
 need restart on change.

___workspace.ignoredFiletypes.description: Filetypes that should be ignored for resolve workspace folder.

___suggest.enablePreview.description: Add preview option to completeopt, default: false.

___http.proxy.description: http proxy uri, used for extensions that send request. Format: proxy-server:1234 or user:password@prox-server:1234 with auth support

___diagnostic.maxWindowHeight.description: Maximum height of diagnostics floating window.

___suggest.snippetIndicator.description: The character used in abbr of complete item to indicate the item could be expand as snippet.

___suggest.highPrioritySourceLimit.description: Max items count for source priority bigger than or equal to 90.

___list.maxPreviewHeight.description: Max height for preview window of list.

___signature.floatTimeout.description: Timeout for hide float window on cursor moved, in miliseconds.

___npm.binPath.description: Command or absolute path to npm or yarn.

___suggest.maxPreviewWidth.description: Maximum width of floating preview window.

___coc.source.buffer.ignoreGitignore.description: Ignore git ignored files for buffer words

___suggest.localityBonus.description: Boost suggestions that appear closer to the cursor position.

___codeLens.separator.description: Separator text for codeLens in virtual text

___suggest.minTriggerInputLength.description: Mininal input length for trigger completion, default 1

___list.extendedSearchMode.description: Enable extended search mode which allows multiple search patterns delimited by spaces.

___signature.enable.description: Enable signature help when trigger character typed, require restart service on change.

___suggest.echodocSupport.description: When enabled, add function signature to user_data.signature to support echodoc.vim

___list.source.outline.ctagsFilestypes.description: Filetypes that should use ctags for outline instead of language server.

___suggest.disableMenu.description: Remove menu field from vim complete item.

___diagnostic.virtualTextPrefix.description: The prefix added virtual text diagnostics

___execArgv.description: Argv passed to node when using module, normally used for debugging, ex: ["--nolazy", "--inspect-brk=6045"]

___transport.description: Transport kind used by server, could be 'ipc', 'stdio', 'socket' and 'pipe'

___transportPort.description: Port number used when transport is 'socket'

___module.description: Absolute path of javascript file, should works in IPC mode

___command.description: Executable in $PATH to start languageserver, should not used with module

___languageserver.description: Dictionary of languageservers, key is used as id of languageserver.

___suggest.disableMenuShortcut.description: Disable shortcut of completion source in menu.

___coc.preferences.currentFunctionSymbol.description: Automatically update the value of b:coc_current_function on CursorHold event

___coc.preferences.hoverTarget.description: Target to show hover information, default is floating window when possible.

___list.signOffset.description: Sign offset of list, should be different from other plugins.

___diagnostic.refreshOnInsertMode.description: Enable diagnostic refresh on insert mode, default false.

___signature.maxWindowHeight.description: Maximum height of floating signature help window.

___coc.preferences.bracketEnterImprove.description: Improve enter inside bracket `<> {} [] ()` by add new empty line below and place cursor to it. Works with `coc#on_enter()`

___diagnostic.displayByAle.description: Use Ale for display diagnostics in vim, will disable coc for display diagnostics, restart required on change.

___list.indicator.description: The characer used as first characer in prompt line

___coc.preferences.extensionUpdateCheck.description: Interval for check extension update, could be daily, weekly, never

___list.previewHighlightGroup.description: Highlight group used for highlight the range in preview window.

___coc.source.buffer.firstMatch.description: Filter complete items by first letter strict match.

___diagnostic.virtualTextLineSeparator.description: The text that will mark a line end from the diagnostic message
